snippet: Antipiracy legislation before both chambers of Congress has bipartisan support, but online content providers are concerned it goes too far. They are right to be alarmed.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column observes antipiracy legislation in Congress has bipartisan support, but online content providers are right to be alarmed it goes too far; discusses why Stop Online Piracy Act as currently written is a bad idea.
lead_paragraph: Antipiracy legislation before both chambers of Congress has bipartisan support, but online content providers are concerned it goes too far. They are right to be alarmed.

headline.seo: The Danger of an Attack on Piracy Online
headline.main: The Danger of an Attack on Piracy Online
headline.print_headline: The Danger Of an Attack On Piracy Online
